handleProductDetails Should set values if interestRangeConfigModel is 0

handleInterestRateValues should set intMin and intMax based on tenor value when productDetail has interestRateRangeType of 1
handleInterestRateValues should set intMin and intMax based on interestRateMin and interestRateMax values when productDetail has interestRateRangeType of 2

handleInterestRateValues should do nothing when productDetail has no pricingConfiguration
